mapper.select: select policy_id, user_id, car_info_id, insured_id, driving_license_id, ic_addtime, ic_totime, ip_id, ci_id, un_id, ic_state, un_shenid, ic_ispayment, ic_money, max_money, msg_table from insurance.insurance_insur_contract where policy_id = #{policyId}

select policy_id, user_id, car_info_id, insured_id, driving_license_id, ic_addtime, ic_totime, ip_id, ci_id, un_id, ic_state, un_shenid, ic_ispayment, ic_money, max_money, msg_table from insurance.insurance_insur_contract limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into insurance.insurance_insur_contract(user_id, car_info_id, insured_id, driving_license_id, ic_addtime, ic_totime, ip_id, ci_id, un_id, ic_state, un_shenid, ic_ispayment, ic_money, max_money, msg_table) values (#{userId}, #{carInfoId}, #{insuredId}, #{drivingLicenseId}, #{icAddtime}, #{icTotime}, #{ipId}, #{ciId}, #{unId}, #{icState}, #{unShenid}, #{icIspayment}, #{icMoney}, #{maxMoney}, #{msgTable})
mapper.update:
update insurance.insurance_insur_contract
user_id = #{userId},
car_info_id = #{carInfoId},
insured_id = #{insuredId},
driving_license_id = #{drivingLicenseId},
ic_addtime = #{icAddtime},
ic_totime = #{icTotime},
ip_id = #{ipId},
ci_id = #{ciId},
un_id = #{unId},
ic_state = #{icState},
un_shenid = #{unShenid},
ic_ispayment = #{icIspayment},
ic_money = #{icMoney},
max_money = #{maxMoney},
msg_table = #{msgTable},
where policy_id = #{policyId}
